extensionAttribute.description: Returns the installed version of Microsoft Sharepoint Browser
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/bash
ExtensionVersion="" if [ -f /Library/Internet\ Plug-Ins/SharePointBrowserPlugin.plugin/Contents/Info.plist ]; then ExtensionVersion=$(defaults read /Library/Internet\ Plug-Ins/SharePointBrowserPlugin.plugin/Contents/Info.plist CFBundleShortVersionString) fi
if [ "$ExtensionVersion" == "" ]; then ExtensionVersion="Not Installed" fi
echo "<result>$ExtensionVersion</result>"
exit 0
